title: I'm a Christian (Catholic). Can I still read Yaoi and BL. What if I want to be a fujoshi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Back in 2013 the Pope said Catholics needed to be more open and accepting of homosexuals among their numbers. He was even an LGBT magazine’s Person of the Year once; “The Advocate” magazine chose him. “the key is for the church to welcome, not exclude, and show mercy, not condemnation.”"If a person is gay and seeks God and has good will, who am I to judge?""The problem, “ … “is not having this orientation. We must be brothers.” Well… if the Pope says that homosexuality isn’t a sin, and he’s supposed to be God’s prime representative, there you go. Of course, a lot of people disagree with this because the Bible states homosexuality is an abomination, but at the end of the day, the Bible also teaches forgiveness and acceptance. So, you should be fine. And Yuri would be fine as well.
